> The Times of India live news app offers everything that an avid news reader is looking for – breaking news, latest headlines, trending stories and in-depth coverage of sports, cricket, entertainment, business, technology, politics & more! 

> From India news to world news, politics to cricket news, technology news to Bollywood news and movie reviews of Bollywood, Hollywood and regional films – get the most relevant coverage of celebrity news.

> The app can set up a daily briefing to give you the most important stories of the day, or you can tap Full Coverage to get everything.
